original_title: Two persons allegedly on way to assassinate businessman arrested
original_body_lines: Two suspects have been arrested with a pistol and a motorcycle while they were allegedly on their way to assassinate a person engaged in the fish trade in Ambalangoda.
The apprehension has been carried out by the Police Special Task Force (STF) as part of the ‘Yukthiya’ special police operation, the Ministry of Public Security said.
